game.name: Celestial Drift
game.shortDescription: Celestial Drift is a space-action sandbox game. Play solo or online. Shoot down various enemies to obtain rare and valuable materials. Sell what you find to buy better equipment and ships. Explore sectors to discover hidden paths, and dare to roam places you shouldn't visit.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Celestial Drift is a space-action sandbox game. Play solo or online. Shoot down various enemies to obtain rare and valuable materials. Sell what you find to buy better equipment and ships. Explore sectors to discover hidden paths, and dare to roam places you shouldn't visit.
